mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fact_production_feature ( production_type, operator_id, action_time, finish_time, partial_warehouse_key, material_id, occur_times ) VALUES ( #{production_type}, #{operator_id}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{finish_time}, #{partial_warehouse_key}, #{material_id}, #{occur_times} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fact_production_feature SET finish_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE fact_pf_key = #{fact_pf_key}
mapper.select: SELECT fpf.fact_pf_key, fpf.production_type, fpf.operator_id, fpf.action_time, fpf.finish_time, fpf.partial_warehouse_key, fpf.material_id, fpf.occur_times, pw.warehouse_date, pw.dn_no FROM fact_production_feature fpf LEFT JOIN partial_warehouse pw ON fpf.partial_warehouse_key = pw.key WHERE fpf.operator_id = #{operator_id} AND fpf.finish_time IS NULL

SELECT pf.material_id, pf.section_id, pf.pace, pf.rework, pf.position_id, v_position.line_name, v_position.process_code, material.omr_notifi_no, material.level, material_partial.order_date, material_partial.bo_flg, material_partial.bo_contents, material_partial.occur_times FROM production_feature pf JOIN v_position ON v_position.position_id = pf.position_id JOIN material ON material.material_id = pf.material_id JOIN material_partial ON material_partial.material_id = material.material_id AND material_partial.occur_times = 1 WHERE v_position.process_code IN(252,321,504) AND pf.finish_time IS NULL
AND pf.material_id = #{material_id}
